1.0.0.en: Created an extension for MELCloud Homey app.

2.0.0.en: Translated app and upgraded for new Homey Web API.

5.0.0.en: Improved recording of target temperature to restore it when refreshing stops.

18.0.0.en: Added air-to-air devices to outdoor temperature sensors.
